ack.title: Authors’ contributions
ack.p: WEY designed and conducted the survey, analysed the data and wrote the manuscript. BTAG, BD and AA revised the draft paper and they have approved the current version for submission and publication. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: Authors are grateful to the Meteorological and Hydrological Agencies of Burkina Faso and Cote d’Ivoire for providing data. We thank the Reviewers and the Editor for their constructive comments. The German Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF) has funded this research through the West African Science Service Center on Climate Change and Adapted Land Use (WASCAL). The study was undertaken at the University of Abomey Calavi in Benin.
